resources.string: Code Potato is a collaborative effort from Terry Wong, Michael Santer, Steven Senatori, David Hua, Jung Hwan Kim, and Rachel Sershon.
This application has been created as work for a class in Advanced Object-Oriented Programming at San Francisco State University.

Some images in this project were created by Blog.SpoonGraphics and are licensed under the Creative Commons license. All source code for the Garble Me Project is licensed the GNU General Public License Version 2, 1991.
File Saved to the Android Music Garble Me directory
